description.ko: FLORA-9은 유기적 진화와 합성 기술의 교차점을 탐구하며, 빛나는 회로와 수정처럼 맑은 데이터 스트림을 통해 식물의 아름다움을 묘사한 미래형 생태계입니다.
description.en: FLORA-9 explores the intersection of organic evolution and synthetic technology, depicting a futuristic ecosystem where botanical beauty is rendered through glowing circuits and crystalline data streams.

prompt: A hyper-realistic digital flora landscape featuring neon-pulsing translucent flowers growing from integrated circuit-board soil, bioluminescent fiber-optic vines climbing geometric metallic structures, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, synthwave aesthetic, intricate electronic petals with liquid data textures.
